attributes.action: review the logic behind asking people to save for their future pension - yet refusing them state benefit of any kind because they have done just that and exceed the £16,000 limit.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: That is it. We have a disabled son of 22 who is unable to find work (despite being highly qualified)  and  is being penalised as a consequence. He has been out of work for two years.

rejection.details: Please ask for a clear action or change in policy.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
